pages.text: All machines in Beyond Earth require energy in order to function. It is best to use power sources/generators from other mods to reach energy requirements.$(br2)Under circumstances where no other power generation is available, Beyond Earth does provide you with some generators to satisfy energy needs.
Using coal as fuel, this machine generates two energy; however, it requires a constant supply of coal to provide power.
pages.title: Coal Generator

pages.text: A reliable and more effective power source, the Solar panel, generates five energy per tick. Although it is a passive energy source, it obviously requires daylight to function.
pages.title: Solar Panel
